title: Dr. Lee Merritt on Parasites, Cancer & Autoimmune Disease
author: Shelleybholisticnu
description: Check out Dr. Lee Merritt's vid called Parasites - A New Paradigm on Bitchute. She's a part of America's Frontline Doctors which is a group that gained notoriety for speaking out against covid mandates. While her training was in allopathic medicine, her exposure to alternative views from the docs involved in the medical freedom movement took her down the parasite rabbit hole. In her video, she explains.. -How she believes parasites are likely at the root cause of disease, including cancer. -
cleaned_text: Check out Dr. Lee Merritt's vid called Parasites - A New Paradigm on Bitchute. She's a part of America's Frontline Doctors which is a group that gained notoriety for speaking out against covid mandates. While her training was in allopathic medicine, her exposure to [alternative views](https://www.shelleybholisticnutrition.com/post/cellcore-s-comprehensive-protocol-helps-reverse-chronic-diseasece) from the docs involved in the medical freedom movement took her down the [parasite rabbit hole](https://www.shelleybholisticnutrition.com/parasitecleanseinfo). In her video, she explains.. -How she believes [parasites are likely at the root cause and look like cancer in digital imaging, -How [cancer and parasites](https://www.facebook.com/ShelleyBHolisticNutrition/videos/1256118201560388) look identical under a microscope. Fascinating info if you're ready to make a "paradigm shift" as she calls it from the modern medical perspective. It's certainly in line with [my perspective](https://www.shelleybholisticnutrition.com/post/my-cancer-story?fbclid=IwAR3OtFPPggtJ4DEZbMV0cznRNmLvi6pHtPvUOIK1D4q1hYnzCr6adc0VsVE) and why [parasite cleansing is a priority for my family](https://www.facebook.com/ShelleyBHolisticNutrition/videos/497237182246896).
